title: Subsidiarity in History: Apprenticeships | Ep 64
description:
I interview diocesan seminarian and Leonine Institute Research Associate Alexander Brown about his article in the inaugural issue of Social Justice Quarterly.

Historical Analysis of Subsidiarity: Where Did It Exist and How? - Alexander Brown
Social Justice Quarterly Vol. 1 Iss. 1
https://leoinstitute.org/socialjusticequarterly/
